title: Fundamentals of Thermodynamics 8th c2013 Borgnakke + Sonntag
description:
Fundamentals of Thermodynamics, 8th Edition (c2013), textbook by Claus Borgnakke & Richard E. Sonntag.

TEXTBOOK INFO: Google these 2 keywords together: Wiley productCd-EHEP002520

CONTENTS: For detailed contents, see the publisher's link found above.
1. Introduction and Preliminaries
2. Properties of a Pure Substance

6. Entropy

11. Gas Mixtures
12. Thermodynamic Relations
13. Chemical Reactions
14. Introduction to Phase and Chemical Equilibrium
15. Compressible Flow
Appendix A SI Units: Single-State Properties
Appendix B SI Units: Thermodynamic Tables

Appendix D Equations of State
Appendix E Figures
Appendix F English Unit Tables
